mapper.insert: insert into tb_item_param_item (id, item_id, created, updated, param_data) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paramData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, item_id, created, updated, param_data from tb_item_param_item
